In October, Sergio Marchionne ignited controversy when he said that Fiat would be better off if it eliminated Italy . Trade unions and politicians accused him of "blackmail" in pushing through a tough deal on working conditions at Fiat's flagship Mirafiori plant in Turin to save the factory from closure. ring MUNCIE, Ind.-- U.S. Rep. Mike Pence discussed his political future-- in somewhat nonspecific terms-- while addressing students in a Central High School social studies class Friday. Mike Pence acknowledged he was considering maybe coming home and running for governor, but the Republican said he was likely months away from making a final decision. He didn't completely rule out seeking a seventh term representing Indiana's 6th District in the U.S. House. While

he is stepping down from his post as Google's chief executive this April- a move that could send shockwaves felt from the search giant's Mountain View headquarters to its Washington D.C. shop. As Executive Chairman, Sen. Joe Lieberman will focus wherever Sen. Joe Lieberman can add the greatest value: externally, on the deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership that are increasingly important given Google's global reach..., Eric Schmidt posted to Google's official blog.
